name: whiteboard
description: A whiteboard app to replace a lost one
author: Brandon O'Toole

scripts.build-dev: rm -r dist; mkdir -p dist/ui; webpack --config webpack.prod.js; mv dist/ ui; mkdir dist; mv ui dist/; cp -a wb-lan-gnomorph-com.conf dist/;
scripts.build: rm -r dist; mkdir -p dist/ui; webpack --config webpack.prod.js; mv dist/ ui; mkdir dist; mv ui dist/; cp -a     wb-gnomorph-com.conf dist/;
scripts.setup-dev: npm run build-dev; gnoDeploy setup    wb-lan-gnomorph-com aine      dist/ 14.17.5
scripts.deploy-dev: npm run build-dev; gnoDeploy deploy   wb-lan-gnomorph-com aine      dist/ 14.17.5
scripts.setup: npm run build;     gnoDeploy setup  wb-gnomorph-com gnoPublic dist/ 14.17.5
scripts.deploy: npm run build;     gnoDeploy deploy wb-gnomorph-com gnoPublic dist/ 14.17.5
